div.p: The Manitowoc Public School District does not discriminate against a person's sex, race, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, pregnancy, marital or parental status, sexual orientation or physical, mental, emotional or learning disability. - Wis. Stat. Sec. 118.13

div.div:
Manitowoc Public School District
Inspiring Education. Empowering Community. Unleashing Potential.

If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by calling (920) 686-4777. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternative format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible.
